abstract: Wells Fargo Chairman Richard Kovacevich says he feels like a kid in a candy store. But he’s taking his time to decide what to buy, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo Chairman Richard Kovacevich says he feels like a kid in a candy store. But he’s taking his time to decide what to buy, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Bides Its Time on Deals
